$comment: JSON Schema for tokens/tokens.json. Edit by Token Owner; update when token shape changes; approvals: Token Owner & Eng Lead.
title: Design System Tokens Schema
description: Root object containing nested token categories. Each leaf token must be an object with a 'value' property.

tokenPrimitive.description: Primitive token value (colors as strings, sizes as strings with units, numbers for unitless values).

type.description: Optional semantic type hint (e.g., color, spacing, font-size, duration, easing, font-family, font-weight, line-height)
